settings.heading: More Than a Brand, A 30-Year Legacy of Innovation
settings.subheading: Our story begins in 1993. For over three decades, we've been the creators and quality guardians behind the world's most trusted fitness equipment.

settings.heading: The Hidden Champions of Fitness
settings.text:
For over two decades, we were the "hidden champion" of the global fitness industry. As Omni Group, we designed and manufactured products for the world's most renowned fitness brands you know and trust. From an idea to a blueprint, to the durable, reliable equipment in your home, we were the creators and quality guardians behind it all.

We mastered core technologies and secured over 50 global patents. We set industry standards, and our products filled the aisles of the world's most respected retailers, like Dick's Sporting Goods, ALDI, and Lidl. We know what true quality means.

settings.heading: The Birth of Ativafit
settings.text:
Yet, a bigger dream always burned within us. We saw countless people drifting away from their health goals due to busy lives and limited space. We believe that fitness should not be a privilege for the few, nor should it be hindered by high prices or complex machinery.

So, in 2018, we decided to step from behind the curtain. Ativafit was born.

We poured three decades of our understanding, technical expertise, and passion for innovation into creating a brand truly for everyone. Ativafit is more than just a name; it carries the pride of our legacy as a top-tier manufacturer and our promise to empower everyone to "Start Where You Are" and enjoy the journey of fitness.

settings.label: Our Philosophy
settings.heading: Fitness is a Right, Not a Privilege
settings.text:
"Start Where You Are."

This is more than our slogan; it's the core of everything we do. We believe there are infinite paths to wellness, and the most crucial step is the first one. Whether you're a beginner just starting to think about fitness, an enthusiast looking to break through plateaus, or a busy professional seeking a moment of peace, Ativafit is your solid ground to start from.

settings.title: Designed for Real Life
settings.text: Every product, especially our adjustable dumbbells—winner of the MUSE Design Award for two consecutive years—is engineered to solve real-world problems: saving space, ensuring ease of use, and guaranteeing durability.

settings.title: Excellence Within Reach
settings.text: Leveraging our powerful supply chain and manufacturing background, we deliver premium quality at a competitive price without compromise. Top-tier quality should not come with a top-tier price tag.

settings.title: Embracing Every Possibility
settings.text: We use a three-color system—Orange, Green, and Purple, representing "Strength," "Endurance," and "Flexibility"—to define our product lines, encouraging you to explore what moves you.

settings.heading: Your Most Trusted Partner in Wellness
settings.text:
Choosing Ativafit means choosing a trusted partner with a 30-year history.

A Commitment to Innovation: We never stop exploring. From our first patented Dial Tech system to the future of AI-driven training with Ativafit.AI, our goal is to harness cutting-edge technology to make your fitness experience simpler, smarter, and more effective.

A Commitment to Quality: Our products are built to a standard tested and approved by the world's most demanding retailers. Every weld, every screw, and every crisp click of our weight adjustment system embodies our relentless dedication to safety and durability.

A Commitment to You: We are here to support you every step of the way. From clear assembly guides and responsive customer service to a vibrant online community, we want to accompany you on your entire fitness journey.

settings.heading: Grow With Us: Become Our Partner
settings.text:
Today, Ativafit's business footprint has successfully covered key markets including China, North America, and Europe through online e-commerce platforms and offline retail chains.

Ativafit's success is built on a network of strong partnerships. We are not only a direct-to-consumer brand but also a world-class B2B partner with extensive supply chain and manufacturing capabilities.

Whether you are a retailer, distributor, or corporate partner, we sincerely invite you to connect with us. Let's grow the home fitness market together and bring the gift of a healthy lifestyle to more people.
settings.overlay_text: Join us. Let's create the future together.
